title: Grateful Dead Live at The Centrum on 1988-04-07
lineage: MAC > Nakamichi DR-8 (no Dolby) > Audiophile 2496 analog-in > Soundforge > CD-Wave > TLH > FLAC. Transferred by Andrew F. Feb 2008. - matrix mixing by Kevin Tobin
source: Matrix 2 Source Mix - SBD (shnid = 91163)Recording Info: SBD -> Cassette Master (TDK SA-X90); Transfer Info: Cassette Master (Nakamichi DR-1) -> Sound Devices 744T (24bit/48k) -> Samplitude Professional v10.02 -> FLAC/16; All Transfers and Mastering By Charlie Miller + AUD (shnid = 90340) AUD: Namamichi CM300's w/CP4 shotguns > Sony TC-D5M > Maxell MX-90's, with no Dolby. Mics on stand in OTS. Taped by Ted Carpenter.
